name: Spiced Banana Bread
author: Jennifer Walsh
summary: This is a very moist banana bread with a little kick of spice.  Loved by my family and all who have tried it.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour two 8x3 inch loaf pans
Whisk together the flour, baking powder, and baking soda; set aside
Mash the bananas, eggs, sugar, cinnamon, salt, nutmeg, and cloves together in a large bowl with a fork until well combined
Stir in the melted butter and vanilla extract, then fold in the flour mixture until a batter forms and no dry lumps remain
Pour into the prepared loaf pans
Bake in preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 45 minutes
Cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then remove from the pan, and allow to cool completely on a wire rack
